entry.title: Testnet block generation
entry.summary: The bitcoin testnet3 network has been generating blocks at a fast rate of at least 6 per minute. Mattia Rossi, a member of the bitcoin-dev mailing list, raised the question regarding this behavior and whether it was normal. However, Jameson Lopp, a bitcoin developer, explained that this is due to a special rule on the testnet. To gain more insight into this special rule, Jameson provided a link to a blog post from Blocktrail that explains how 16k blocks were found in one day during testing. The explanation for the fast block generation can be found in the provided link.
